spec_data.Name: perl-Perlilog
spec_data.Description:
Perlilog is a command-line tool which generates Verilog
modules from a set of files, which come in several other
formats. It was originally designed to integrate Verilog IP cores.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:11:04 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Verilog environment and IP core handling in Perl
